headline: LyondellBasell (LYB) Loses 6% After Dividend Record Date
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Losing Their Fire. LyondellBasell Industries NV (NYSE:LYB) is one of the worst performers on Thursday. LyondellBasell extended its losing streak to a fourth straight day on Thursday, losing 6.24 percent to close at $43.16 apiece as investors unloaded portfolios following the ex-dividend and record dates to receive its next quarterly […]
